Title: Outer Pier
Description:
Timbers groan; the sea answers. Kelp sticks like old coins. Beneath, something moves.

A crooked ladder descends into the dark—if you had a light.
Paragraphs: Timbers groan; the sea answers. Kelp sticks like old coins. Beneath, something moves.
A crooked ladder descends into the dark—if you had a light.
